attributes.action: Stop the cull of deer and other animals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm 13 yr old angharad biggs, I am starting a petition to stop cullings like the 30th Nov deer cull in the Quantox hills in Somerset. I want to stop all animal culls and I think we should find other ways to limit deer and other animal numbers. Please support me in my campaign.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
